altername_name: ウイザードリィ Ⅵ＆Ⅶ コンプリート
name: Wizardry VI & VII Complete
overview: Wizardry VI & VII Complete (ウィザードリィ VI ＆ VII コンプリート) is a compilation for the Sega Saturn containing the RPGs Wizardry VI: Bane of the Cosmic Forge and Wizardry VII: Crusaders of the Dark Savant from the long-running Wizardry franchise. This compilation was only released for the Sega Saturn in Japan.
